product.title: Cars: Back on Track | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Cars: Back on Track

Fasten your seat belts as you and your child read the fast-paced prequel to Cars. Lightning McQueen is off to race in the Piston Cup leaving behind his friends in Radiator Springs. Knowing that McQueen is going to need all the help he can get, Doc decides to lead McQueen's pit crew down the Old Road to the track. Cars: Back on Track is a high-octane ride about the importance of friendship and how we can all use a bit of help.

Tie-in Activity: Hide several toy cars around the house. Give directions to your child on where to find the cars. Use traffic terms such as "stop, go, turn right, turn left, and back up" to direct your child to the hidden cars.
